ConnectionStrings.IdentityConnection: Server=<localhost or another Mysql server name>;Database=<database name>;User Id=<user name>;Password=<password>;SslMode=none;
ConnectionStrings.DataConnection: Server=<localhost or another Mysql server name>;Database=<database name>;User Id=<user name>;Password=<password>;SslMode=none;
ConnectionStrings.KeysFolder: <Path to folder with keys storage (e.g. C:\Temp\keys). Must be same in MTD OrderMaker Server appsettings.json>
ConnectionStrings.Domain: <application startup domain name - 'localhost' or domain name with dot at the start e.g. '.example.com'. Must be same in MTD OrderMaker Server appsettings.json>
ConnectionStrings.ClientName: <Any text word for compatibility with CPQ Manager. Must be same in MTD OrderMaker Server appsettings.json>

ConfigSettings.CatalogCulture: <Currency of catalog e.g. 'it-IT' is euro, 'en-US' is dollar>
ConfigSettings.OrderMakerLink: <MTD OrderMaker Server web address (default must be https://localhost:5001)>
